actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain parts of direct process electrostatic copying machines and to include accessories in the suspension.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1992, the duty on certain parts and accessories of indirect process electrostatic copying machines.

titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain parts of direct process electrostatic copying machines and to include accessories in the suspension.
